author: Francisco Rodrigues
title: Bitcoin Rewards Firm Fold Secures $250M Facitlity to Expand BTC Holdings
description: The facility grants the company the right to issue and sell new shares pending regulatory conditions.
content:
Fold (FLD), a publicly traded bitcoin financial services company, has secured an equity purchase facility worth up to $250 million to grow its bitcoin 
 holdings.The Arizona-based firm said on Tuesd… [+472 chars]
